response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it could greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, we're confident it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $100 for this product. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a great opportunity to acquire something truly special. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 100}
